N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 620.7 - Requirements for submitting an application for certification of need for a new program or construction

State Regulations
(a) An
application for certification of need for a new program or construction shall
be in writing in the form and format approved by OPWDD. Submission of the
application shall be in the manner specified by OPWDD. (b) The applicant shall attest to his or her
awareness of the requirements for operation in accordance with an operating
certificate and the obligation to be certified prior to initiating operation
and shall provide any other information as the commissioner may
require. (c) OPWDD shall advise the
applicant of the procedures and schedule for review at the time of the
submission of the application. (d) The standards of this Part shall be applied to all applications at appropriate
points in the program development process. Review and approval of a
certification of need application does not in and of itself ensure program
certification. Notes
